Home » News » Sterling Bank customers rue over failed online payment, dormant account reactivation Sterling Bank customers rue over failed online payment, dormant account reactivation On 4:56 am In News by Tony Comments 
Muhammed Mumuni 
I tried making an online payment with my Verve card and you people deducted my money and the payment didn’t reflect on what am paying for, So I tried reporting the case to your branch where I opened the account and they said they have lodged complaint but till now I have not gotten a refund! Please sir/ma Kindly help on what step to take to get a refund of my money. Thanks. 
Sterling Bank response 
Hello 
Muhammed Mumuni , we apologize about your experience. Kindly send us a personal message with the details of the transaction for further assistance. Thank you. •Yemi Adeola, Sterling Bank MD 
Olasunkanmi Ajose 
I cannot check my acct balance and make fund transfer on my mobile phone any more unlike before when I used to do it at will with your bank codes. When I complained at one of your branches, the response turned me off, telling me to download the bank app. Even, when I downloaded the app with my Sterling Bank registered phone number, I still didn’t get it after promising to send my app with pin code with which I use to register it. Up till now, I am yet to receive the pin code. You people should be customer- oriented. 
Sterling Bank response 
Hello 
Olasunkanmi, thank you for contacting us. We apologize about your experience. Kindly confirm the error message you get when you try to use the USSD codes. 
Olasunkanmi Ajose 
Now that I have received my activation key number completing every necessary things ought to be done. Could you Please tell me the meaning of e-money bank and bank in the app as I cannot check balance, buy airtime, pay my cable bill and make transfer and receipt of funds. Thanks. 
Sterling Bank response 
Hi Olasunkanmi, thank you for contacting us, please be informed that the E-money is a virtual wallet that can be funded on the application and to cash out you may need to visit a Sterling money agent or the branch, please confirm if you have been profiled for the Sterling money application at the branch. Tony
